DESCRIPTION: Persona are 0 cost Skill cards that change the active Arcana, grant special passive effects, and draw a card when drawn. You can only have one Persona at a time.
Arcana are cards that transform into different cards depending on the active Arcana.
This card belongs to the Priestess Arcana.
This card belongs to the Emperor Arcana.
This card belongs to the Fool Arcana.
This card belongs to the Judgement Arcana.
This card belongs to the Death Arcana.
Deck refers to the hand, draw pile, and discard pile.
